name: Veal Shank With Sauce Gribiche
keywords: carrot, onion, veal shank, low-sodium, main course, winter
recipeIngredient: 1 cup trimmed, scraped coarsely chopped carrots

recipeInstructions.text: Make 8 gashes in veal shank. Cut garlic into 8 thin slices and insert.
Put shanks in kettle and add all remaining ingredients except sauce. Bring to boil and cover. Let simmer about 2 1/2 hours.
Remove shank and strain cooking liquid, discarding solids. Slice meat and serve with sauce gribiche. Reserve broth for future use.
